mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_brand WHERE brand_name=#{brandName} AND status='ENTER'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_brand ( brand_name, brand_image, create_date, update_date, status, country, contact_phone, contact, short_name) VALUES ( #{brandName}, #{brandImage}, now(), now(), 'ENTER', #{country}, #{contactPhone}, #{contact}, #{shortName} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, brand_name, brand_image, create_date, update_date, status, country, contact_phone, contact, short_name FROM t_brand WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_brand SET brand_name=#{brandName}, brand_image=#{brandImage}, status=#{status}, country=#{country}, contact_phone=#{contactPhone}, contact=#{contact}, short_name=#{shortName}, update_date=now() WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, brand_name, brand_image, create_date, status, short_name FROM t_brand WHERE 1=1 AND CONCAT_WS('',brand_name,short_name) LIKE #{searchKey}
